title: IP Glitch
body:
Currently my store IP is not updating with my client IP meaning I am unable to purchase any champions in the store. I bought a cheap rune to see if that will update my in store IP however it just lowered the amount of "store IP" relative to me client IP.  In the screen shot I have attached it shows that my client has 6303 but the store tells me I have 5915 IP. Any assistance in fixing this issue would be greatly appreciated.

*First time making post I don't know if this is the right place.

replies.body:
Hi Triogon,

Thanks for the detailed report! We're currently looking into the cause of the problem and will [update in the main discussion thread here](http://(http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/FKoAQK2M-not-enough-ip-bug)

This is also the right place for a post like this!
Thank you Riot Zaps! I appreciate all the great work you guys do and thanks for the help

Dude i have the same problem and no one has helped me, i emailed Riot but they gave me the classic pre made email about thanks for being patient :(, its still happening to me and i don't know how to fix it
